ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] ss boots
ygData.msgSnippet: the effects kick in at level 44 i was told by a couple people on the server. Also heard there s no level required on the gloves Minkin Sol Ro ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
the effects kick in at level 44 i was told by a couple people on the server.
Also heard there's no level required on the gloves

Minkin
Sol Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:garramone@...]
Sent: October 15, 2000 10:35 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] ss boots


i'm not sure but i think around level 45. a level 43 friend could not use
them though. and i never use the effect on the legs or boots since it is
only 1 per cast, so i am not sure they poof when you log but i would think
yes.

Shada

> Hello everyone,
>
